episodes_names: I'm Going to Marry Her Once I Leave This School
Girls are in the Dorm. But I can't say it yet. Wait Until Tomorrow.
Leave it to Me, There is a Chance We're Going to Win This Athletic Meet
We're Almost to the Goal. The Track Meet 'll End Just Fine.
Believe and Wait for Me. I'm not Going to be Late for My Date With Everyone.
Phew. Don't scare me like that. I guess you're just a little sister.
I Learned Something Amazing. I'll Hide Myself Before I can be Erased
I'll catch up to you. Have I ever broken a promise to you before?
Someday, it'd be Nice if We Could all Go to a Festival Together Again
Hold this for Me. The Winner of the Beauty Contest is Written Here.
We Don't all Have to Dance. I can Dance by Myself
It's a Cruel World. I'm Going to Take a Look in the Shadows.
